website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice if you prefer an athletic fit, especially since Lemorecn shorty wetsuits also protect against UV rays, provide lasting warmth, and are made to last a long time.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, small to XXXL
Flatlock seams to prevent skin irritation
cons: Some specific size and color combinations may be difficult to find online

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is so far off it's not even funny
customer_reviews.text: In every day clothes I wear a size 2 or 4. I bought a size 4 jump suit and couldn't even get it over my hips (I weigh 125 and am 5'7'') I ordered a size 6 next and that didn't fit either. I just had to buy a size 8 and 10 and hopefully one of those fit, this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Wet suit worked well as swimming pool cooled in fall weather
customer_reviews.text: Fitting took a bit of extra effort, but there was no problem returning original and ordering larger size. Once I got a fit, I used the "Spring" or 3/4 wet suit to continue swimming in an unheated pool even though the water turned colder, as expected, in the fall. The suit makes swimming laps comfortable with water temperatures down to 65 F or a bit lower. However, outside temperature has dropped to 40s and 30s, at least for now, and I have suspended the laps until warmer weather. Note, I also use Vaseline on lower legs and arms which helps the warmth factor quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle B

customer_reviews.title: Received the diving suit, tried it on and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the diving suit, tried it on and it fits, until I have to bend over to reach my feet. I can't barely bend to put my fins. The height is to short. I'm 5'9" bought the X-Large supposedly fit 5'11" to 6'1". I can't find out how to return it for an exchange. Update- I was able to return it and purchased a bigger size. Very satisfied with Amazon and the wetsuit
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Fits good. Used it in Gulf waters at about 64*
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Used it in Gulf waters at about 64*. Kept me very comfortable. Plenty of movement for kayaking. I'm about 6'3" 250# and a 3x fits good. A bit snug in the chest but otherwise all good.
customer_reviews.author: txmustang

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned - I'm 6' 2", 240 lb or so, and I usually buy XL shirts that fit loosely (L is a bit too tight). But the listing said I should get a 2XL. Well, it fits just like a wetsuit should - snug, but not restrictive, and it doesn't choke me or pinch anywhere - color me VERY satisfied. Construction looks good, nice, heavy zipper, etc. - time will tell, I'll revisit after I've used it more :)
customer_reviews.author: H. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: base sizing on height ... and as a result torso size
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money. Best advise is to read the sizing info. Go by height measurements before any other. I got a XXXL based on height, although the waist was more than I needed, it was the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Howard B.

customer_reviews.title: First wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving the wetsuit four stars because it's too soon to give it five. I ordered a xxl and it fit fine--I'm big boned, some gut, stand 5' 9" and weigh 206.This is my first wetsuit and I really didn't know what to expect when using it yesterday, the day after it was delivered. Anyway there were no problems, and it is obvious that it will allow me two weeks to a month more time enjoying our northern Minnesota cold water, mainly using my SUP.
customer_reviews.author: rachmilievitch

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and performance of product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wet suit so I am no expert, but when it comes to size and comfort, also the ease of zipping it on or off , also the price I say this is a pretty awesome buy. I gave it 4 stars because I haven't actually dived with it yet, so I'll come back an update ...btw I am 5'2 and size 10. I got and XL just incase and I am glad I did because it fit perfect not to tight not to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery purchasing a wet suit that wasn't from a well-known name brand, and where the size chart didn't have an exact match for all my measurements (for reference, 6'2", 220lbs, 36 waist, 44L jacket). The 2XL fit me exactly as it should - just the right amount of snugness. It seems well made. Did it have a strong odor of neoprene out of the package? Absolutely, but that's what it's made of. Stunk up the whole room after I opened it. But, one soak in the tub with a little dish detergent and now it's hanging in my closet. Can't smell it unless I'm within a foot of it. Overall, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great, quality so far seems great.
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried it in my pool once so I can’t attest to the longevity yet but this wetsuit is great! I wasn’t sure if it would fit since I’m kind of fluffy (fat) but it is perfect. Easy to put on and the zipper is smooth and easy to use. I’ll be test driving it in the lake next week when I go diving. Will update my review later.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H Park

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a late summer trip to the shore.
customer_reviews.text: Last minute trip to the Atlantic shore to try to save a bit summer, #covid. I figured a wetsuit would allow him to get in the water in the late September weather. I was not wrong. Without it he would have never been able to boogie board for enjoy the ocean. I really know nothing about wetsuits except for some brief research on the internet. All I can say is this fits our use perfectly! Money well spent to enjoy a couple days of vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Perfect for summer
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one like any other size wize that you would normally wear. LG is my usual size and I read the reviews that told me the fit was too small so i sized up. Don't bother. This is a good quality suit and the cost is great. I love the rear zip...so easy to get out of rather than a work out at the end of an afternoon of surfing trying to get free of the wet suit. No jaws of life needed to get free!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Q.

customer_reviews.title: 5-star suit probably, but I have no comparisons
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wetsuit. It fit awesome and was really comfortable. I've never owned another one so I can't compare comfort, size, or warmth. That's the only reason I didn't give this 5 stars, as I'm sure there are better ones out there based on price! But it got the job done in cold Lake Michigan waters late spring/early summer. It kept me plenty warm to stay in the water for a good amount of time. I would buy this exact one again if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small. Look at the sizing chart and measure
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to verify your size and take measurements or you’ll be returning this wet suit. They rum tight. So tight you cannot pull up the zipper and I’m very skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Nick bell

customer_reviews.title: Go for long sleeves not short.
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality for the price. I purchased 2 suits. We are using it for kayaking, supping, snorkeling. So far , about a month of using it, good enough. 4 and not 5 simply because it has short sleeves. Maybe my fault but I think I went through all the details and didn’t notice. So ..
customer_reviews.author: Yacov Melamed

customer_reviews.title: works well but legs are not as snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit so that i I could do exercises in a pool when the water was still cool, the suit did keep me warm until the water go up under the leg part. The top fits well it is just the legs that are larger. I do feel it was a good value for the money but would consider a full body suit the next time.
customer_reviews.author: RN1

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality, and memories
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this suit using their recommended size guide, and it fits perfect! Quality is excellent, nice stitching, and great fabric. I'm a senior who purchased this great suit to help me to endure the freezing cold Lake Michigan waters...during August! This suit allowed me to protect and insulate my body core and enjoy a snorkeling expedition with my son and my grandson! I'm glad I purchased, as it allowed me withstand the water temps while making wonderful lifetime memories!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Aweful chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because of the aweful chemical smell, it will literally make u sick.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit for the price. Well made and comfortable. I probably could have ordered a smaller size but ordering based on measurements the suit fit and not overly tight. I was very comfortable in water temps slightly above 65. I like this suit as well as the very expensive name brands that I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JJGJ-lakelovers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit. I took it to the springs here in Florida where the water temp was 70° and I was warm the whole time. The seams held up well and it was easy to get on and off. I am 5' 10'' and 215lbs and the XL suit fit perfect. So well in fact we bought another one for my wife. She is about 5' 8" 135lbs and the mens S fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Obara

customer_reviews.title: Works well, the neck frayed after only a few uses though
customer_reviews.text: They neckline severely frayed after only about 5 hours of wearing. It’s too bad because other than this flaw it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY SATISFIED OVERALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and Super comfortabkle and I can hardly wait to get to the water to break it in.!!! Excellent product and at such a reasonable cost.My entire shopping experience was just fantastic,even the shipping time was unbelievable...I got it much earlier than quoted..(As usual ALl SMILES)
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Davis,

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the $.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful Half Men sweatsuit. We were looking at something similar at Big 5 and we found this for almost half the price and it seems to be the exact same quality. My husband likes to exercise in the pool and we have a non-heated pool, so in the winter months in Arizona this helps him to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We now have several of these wetsuits for our kids. The material is slightly thicker (3mm vs others that are 2.5mm) and they fit my daughters well for tubing and water skiing early summer or late summer. They've also used them at the pool in early summer when the water is still cold. Would highly recommend this brand as the quality for the price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: David M Krebs Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Wetsuit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wetsuit worked as expected. I used for 5 dives in November in the Caribbean, and it worked perfectly. I am 6ft, 175lbs and bought the large based on other reviews, but found it to be a bit loose through the body, although not to the point of causing an issue. Not sure if a medium would have been a better choice on not due to my height. Overall i am very happy with the suit for what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: klone99

customer_reviews.title: I went down a size from the size chart recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: Received it, tried it on (dry), it seems well made and I expect it to last for at least a few diving trips to the caribbean. I am 5’8”, 165 lbs, and my measurements were right in line with the size 12 on the size chart, but it was too big. Ordered a size 10 and it fit much better. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: mmmm

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Never owned one before but found it to be very good quality. I’m 6’3” 235 lbs and the 3X was perfect. I purchased it to be able to comfortably clean the bottom of my boat myself during the cooler waters in southwest Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: For my son - fits good, looks good.  Keeps him warm.  What else do you want?
customer_reviews.text: We are in So Cal where the ocean is cold. The last month had some unusually cold water & this was a necessity. It is not a full body suit which would be an overdone. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go surfing for my 5”11” son who is skinny. The fit was comfortable and warm. Also is of good quality and it still looks new after a week long surf trip
customer_reviews.author: McLean mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot! Kinda wish I got the XXL instead of XXXL. it’s a little loose in the water, but still works great. Neck is snug though. (I’m 6’2”, 245lbs)
customer_reviews.author: KB-Boise

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for a good price. Good fit and not difficult to get on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Marks

customer_reviews.title: Short trunk
customer_reviews.text: The thing is, the torso body just is short. My torso is super long so I guess it’s to be expected, but I was hoping it would stretch more. Why are there more wetsuits designed for people with long bodies?
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pershouse

customer_reviews.title: A plus plus in my book
customer_reviews.text: Sizes of a little off the stitching is great A little bit of a pouch in the crotch but other than that colors on point no fading seems very durable and other than size issues as advertised I would definitely recommend it anybody needing a spring suit for their of you'll love it I spend all my time in the water
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value..we use for PWC...not too sure how well it would be for scuna diving.. not the highest quality. If you need an inexpensive suit this will be fine...runs small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kept me absolutely comfortable in Hawaii's winter water (the locals complain that the ...
customer_reviews.text: This kept me absolutely comfortable in Hawaii's winter water (the locals complain that the water is cold this time of year). I even took it down below 100' and I didn't notice any change in temp at all. I would never wear it where I normally dive, however (Puget Sound in Washington State), but in the warmer zones I just dove in I'm glad I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: good suit size carefully
customer_reviews.text: Little problem with the size I usually wear medium 44 inch coat. For this suit I could not get a medium over my shoulders. I bought a large and it fits tho slightly loose. Keeps me warm so all is good. Nicely made and water tight. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit, wore it for sailing and snorkeling and it perfect especially for the price. Zipper works well and great with the long strap for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: SpringClean Cleanse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a big guy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I am 5'6 240+ very muscular build. Fits perfect in all of the right places. The 3x was right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: john8ist

customer_reviews.title: Value. It fits. You can still move. It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be able to enjoy the water when it was a little cold- this suit did the trick. I was able to continue my exercise plan even when the water was colder than otherwise enjoyable. Will buy again in the next size down when I lose some weight!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Golz

customer_reviews.title: Swimming in my pool year round.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Came today and Hurricane Harvey had cooled our pool down to 69 degrees. The suit worked great. Looking forward to winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’1’’ and am 240lbs. The XXXL fit me really well. It was super comfortable and melts me warm. The quality was great too. Well made and I can tell it will last. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Irby

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely order one size up.  Very comfortable fit and feel with top quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is fantastic! I'm 5'10" 165 with a normal build. I couldn't agree more about ordering one size up, unless you want to feel like your wearing a compression suit. I'm impressed with the quality for the price. Very satisfied thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gill

customer_reviews.title: Arrived great quality
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not using because the place we visited provided wetsuits, but these looked to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Frost

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Bad stitches in the neck area, that gets very painful.
customer_reviews.author: DUPUY Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this suit ahead of my SCUBA classes. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this suit ahead of my SCUBA classes.. i have yet to use it underwater but so far it fits semi tight.. so i either gained weight or the suit is a tad too small. Follow up review to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus Ex

customer_reviews.title: good quality, nice design at a good price
customer_reviews.text: it was very helpful, nice quality of course some people think this is a every day use and material quality is not for 24/7 pros, size is not perfect simply because is not cutom made but just go by you body size and you will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio J Pinales

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits well. He’s a big kid and was worried which size but the 2xl
customer_reviews.author: DELI

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy to put on and fit to size.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it fits very well and feels like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: mitchellm

customer_reviews.title: Good 3mm wetsuit. If you just need a basic shorty, this will do fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of a spare tire, so needed the next size up from my pant size. I used this last weekend for rafting in the river and it was great. Nice product, solid quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander D. King

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wet suit for the price. I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Fast delivery. Will do business again A+
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ganev

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly, feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: For my next vacation in Caribbean island, scuba and swiming, fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Matos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Iam 5'9" 200lbs stocky just little bit to big sent back ordeared xl iteam nice low priced my 1st wetsuit
customer_reviews.author: bobby digital

customer_reviews.title: perfect wetsuit for cold lake waverunner ride
customer_reviews.text: the wet suit was comfortable and does the job to keep you warm and afloat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Tried to squeeze into this but at 6'1" and 295 it is just too small
customer_reviews.author: James Alward

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: large worked for me, a scrawny 6ft 140 lb 76 year old man.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: I did and perfect fit good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was told to go up 1 size than expected. I did and perfect fit good quality. I'm pleased
customer_reviews.author: TIM WAZELLE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Little to snug in the uhoh spot but wasn't to bad since I was able to wear it for 5hours straight
customer_reviews.author: Yuly

customer_reviews.title: Fits Small
customer_reviews.text: Fits small. I am 6'3", 215 lb and the XXL fit perfectly. I would normally go wear XL.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Buy it on the smaller size so it fits snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald dienstmann

customer_reviews.title: great fit at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am buying the female version my husband loved so much in Maui.
customer_reviews.author: KBT

customer_reviews.title: This suit fits well and works to keep you warm and protected in the water.
customer_reviews.text: Took the suit snorkeling in Molokai, Maui. Worked great and kept me warm. Don't think because Hawaii is warm that the water is warm too, because it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good value, was worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Provided the comfort and warmth needed snorkeling in cool waters.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to put on, but after that is fine
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the suit it was kind of difficult to close the neck strap, but after trying it in the pool, I did notice water gets in through the neck closure. My belly and torse was dry. So it does work for lap swiming.
customer_reviews.author: D. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Order on the larger side as these fit a little tighter than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly - 5'6" - 160lb - Size Medium
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and feels great. I have yet to try it in the water but anticipate it will do what its supposed to. I am 5ft 6 in and 160lb normal build.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very warm in 70 degree water and the second Velcro to hold the zipper up is awesome. Used a few times and still holds up
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is a good size young man. I was afraid the xl would be too small and the next size up too big, but was a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. It fix perfectly and he said it was comfortable. It arrived on time in an easy open plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Champoux

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap wetsuit I was pleasantly surprised! We'all see how it holds up after repetitive use. Must have for chilly water!
customer_reviews.author: McStalkerton Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for an upcoming vacation with lots of snorkeling. The wet suit fit well (I followed the sizing guide), and performed well. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this wet-suit.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great wet-suit. Bought for warm water scuba, snorkel. Large fit me perfectly. I'm 5"8" 175lbs. with a 40 inch Chest. Durable, sturdy with strong zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Chew

customer_reviews.title: Fit as advertised. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use this suit for water volleyball. Nice fit according to chart. Affords good movement and keeps me toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit. tried it on, fit well, will use it this summer in Bonaire.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my friend loosely in the chest and stomach area, i.e. cold water and drag when spearing fish.
customer_reviews.author: FRED BARNES

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Order a size large.
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit for price. Very satisfied. Order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN B ZABRISKIE

customer_reviews.title: 👋👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Great quality nice and tight maybe a little too tight in the Boys area but it will work great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, suggestion I have another type of suit and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, suggestion I have another type of suit and there's is a small zippered pocket in the leg which I like and can put lip balm in it when I'm playing watervolleyball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and off at the beach. The zipper is smooth and the quality of the neoprene is good. Nice fit too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: The price is great that's half the price of a dive shop and it fits very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be good quality, ordered it for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had fit
customer_reviews.text: Was great quality, just didn't fit. I'm 5'7" and 345lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Women

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always by XL for my husband -- this was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thickness.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thickness...warm and comfortable. This was a women’s suit although the order comes up as men’s. That was confusing.
customer_reviews.author: C.dinicola

customer_reviews.title: hopeful
customer_reviews.text: cant wait to see if it helps me float and keeps the chill off.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It fit everywhere except too tight with underarms. Making it difficult to move freely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wetsuit seems of good quality construction and free of any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Tried it on a recent excursion overseas - works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Get one now. Tried it on a recent excursion overseas - works like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cedar

customer_reviews.title: It’s probably warm enuf for most people . I’m always cold and needed long sleeves and long pants.
customer_reviews.text: Lemorecn is a great brand. Well made size is as expected. Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: megan primeaux

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly and she looks great in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girlfriend. It fits perfectly and she looks great in it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Good shortie. Very useful
customer_reviews.text: easy yo put on and zip up. I am getting good use out of it. price good as well
customer_reviews.author: alicec

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like really good material fits a little small but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like really good material fits a little small but I think they're supposed to fit a little tight and it loosens in the water. I'm 6foot and weigh 165 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Cheapware

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I returned the short suit and got a full one...made more sense. Haven't used it yet...for an upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! My hubby wears it for triathlons and open water swims. I was searching for a sleeveless brand but he’s a big dude (tall and horizontal- at least he was bigger before all his training). We were limited on available options. I purchased this and another brand just in case. He ended up loving this one. We figured we’d cut the sleeves off once it for ease of free style swimming. It ended up fitting so comfortably we left the sleeves and he prefers it that way. He was size 3x (larger in the abdomen) before. Now, mostly broad chest, smaller tummy, and a 2x. Fits for him still. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay E.

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: Hubby tends to get cold in water so he bought this and enjoyed using it for wave riding. If you plan to swim in colder water, you will need a full length one though :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jean G

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I put on a few pounds since my last wet suit. Might go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Motz

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Wetsuits Adult's Premium Neoprene Diving Suit 3mm Shorty Jumpsuit
feature_bullets: MULTI SPORT WETSUIT: Wetsuit designed for all water sports like diving, scuba, paddle boarding, surfing, or kayaking.
DURABILITY: Spot taped at stress points and flatlock seams provide a smooth interior and exterior surface to ensure maximum comfort and durability.
NEOPRENE: Constructed with premium neoprene for a comfortable and athletic fit.
3mm neoprene for warmth without sacrificing flexibility.
FEATURES: Easy-reach, extra-long leash and easy on with heavy-duty YKK back zipper ; Order the product according to your body measurements.
